Join us in Washington, D.C. to celebrate our marriage.

Our wedding registry

As we look forward to beginning our life together, we have created a registry to help friends and family looking for gift suggestions. For most kitchen items, we’ve registered at Hill’s Kitchen, a local shop on Capitol Hill. In addition, our registry on The Knot includes household items from Target and Pottery Barn, as well as honeymoon experiences.
